trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The StrokeCollection enables you to perform functions such as hit testing, clipping, and erasing strokes.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta StrokeCollection consente di eseguire funzioni, ad esempio l'hit test, il ritaglio e la cancellazione dei tratti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> control performs many of these functions, but if you need more control than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> provides, the StrokeCollection offers more options.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>controllo esegue molte di queste funzioni, ma se è necessario un maggiore controllo rispetto di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>fornisce, StrokeCollection offre più opzioni.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn about managing digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencati come informazioni sulla gestione di input penna su un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values |Term|Definition| |----------|----------------| |`isfString`|A string that represents the stroke in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).|
trans-unit.target: | Per eseguire questa operazione... | Vedere l'articolo | |-----------------|----------------------| | Creare un controllo che raccoglie penna | [La creazione di un input penna di controllo di Input](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Creare un controllo che consente all'utente di selezionare input penna | [Procedura: selezionare tra un controllo personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Creare un controllo che consente all'utente di input penna punto cancellazione | [Come: cancellare l'input penna su un controllo personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | # # attributo XAML ``` ``` # # utilizzo di elemento oggetto XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML | Termini | Definizione | |----------|----------------| | `isfString`| Stringa che rappresenta il tratto in base&64;, codificato input penna serializzato formato (ISF). |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> class that contains the specified strokes.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> classe che contiene i tratti specificati.

trans-unit.source: The strokes to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I tratti per aggiungere il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> of Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> dall'oggetto specificato <xref:System.IO.Stream>di input penna serializzato formato (ISF).</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream that contains ink data.
trans-unit.target: Flusso che contiene i dati di input penna.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified strokes to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge i tratti specificati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Add method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il metodo Add di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: A in strokes is already a member of the .
trans-unit.target: A in strokes is already a member of the .

trans-unit.source: strokes is .
trans-unit.target: strokesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds a custom property to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge una proprietà personalizzata per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AddPropertyData method enables you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddPropertyData consente di aggiungere proprietà personalizzate a un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile includere informazioni aggiuntive con un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to associate with the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Guid>per associare la proprietà personalizzata.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The value of the custom property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: `propertyData` must be of type <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> or an array of these data types, except <xref:System.String>, which is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `propertyData`deve essere di tipo <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Byte>,<xref:System.Int16>,<xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.DateTime>, <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>o una matrice di questi tipi di dati, ad eccezione di <xref:System.String>, che non è consentito.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: propertyDataId is an empty .
trans-unit.target: propertyDataIdè un oggetto vuoto .

trans-unit.source: -or- propertyData is not one of the allowed data types listed in the section.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - propertyData non è uno dei tipi di dati consentiti nel sezione.

trans-unit.source: Clears all strokes from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cancella tutti i tratti dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that are outside the bounds of the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti i tratti di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> che rientrano nei limiti dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> matrice.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di ritaglio connette il primo e ultimo punto in `lassoPoints` per creare il lazo.

trans-unit.source: The Clip method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it clips.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di ritaglio genera il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che Ritaglia.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che specifica l'area di ritaglio.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not extend beyond the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce tutti i tratti ritagliati dal rettangolo specificato con tratti nuovi che non si estende oltre il rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely outside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Vengono rimossi tutti i tratti completamente di fuori del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be clipped.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica l'area di ritaglio.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method copies each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in the collection and the new <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> references the new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Clone copia ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>nella raccolta e il nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>fa riferimento a nuovi tratti.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una copia del <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce se l'identificatore di proprietà personalizzata specificata si trova il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Guid>per individuare il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified custom property identifier is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'identificatore della proprietà personalizzata specificata si trova il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Consente di disegnare i tratti di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> on which to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> su cui disegnare il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the ink that is within the bounds of the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'input penna entro i limiti dell'area specificata.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method connects the first and last points in `lassoPoints` to create the lasso.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo di cancellazione si connette il primo e ultimo punto in `lassoPoints` per creare il lazo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>potrebbe contenere tratti nuovi dopo che viene chiamato il metodo di cancellazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'area specificata si trova al centro di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, il metodo di cancellazione rimuove l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e crea due tratti nuovi.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Genera il metodo di cancellazione di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che Cancella.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che specifica l'area da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the specified rectangle with new strokes that do not enter the bounds of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce tutti i tratti ritagliati dal rettangolo specificato con tratti nuovi che non si immette i limiti del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>potrebbe contenere tratti nuovi dopo che viene chiamato il metodo di cancellazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified area is through the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'area specificata si trova al centro di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, il metodo di cancellazione rimuove l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e crea due tratti nuovi.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: All strokes that are entirely inside the specified rectangle are removed.
trans-unit.target: Vengono rimossi tutti i tratti interamente all'interno del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Genera il metodo di cancellazione di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che Cancella.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the area to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica l'area da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: Replaces all strokes that are clipped by the region created by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> along the specified path with new Strokes that are not clipped by the region.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce tutti i tratti ritagliati dall'area creata dall'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> lungo il percorso specificato con tratti nuovi che non vengono ritagliati dall'area.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> might contain new strokes after the Erase method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>potrebbe contenere tratti nuovi dopo che viene chiamato il metodo di cancellazione.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `path` intersects the middle of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the erase method removes that <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> and creates two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se `path` interseca il centro di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, il metodo di cancellazione rimuove l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>e crea due tratti nuovi.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The Erase method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it erases.
trans-unit.target: Genera il metodo di cancellazione di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>che Cancella.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that specifies the path to be erased.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che specifica il percorso da cancellare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of the eraser.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> che specifica la forma della gomma.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the strokes in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i limiti dei tratti nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The GetBounds method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> that takes the appearance of the rendered <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetBounds restituisce una <xref:System.Windows.Rect>che accetta l'aspetto del rendering <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is 10 display independent pixels (DIP) wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> includes the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>è 10 visualizzazione indipendente pixel (DIP), <xref:System.Windows.Rect>include l'intera larghezza del <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Rect> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the bounds of the strokes in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> contenente i limiti dei tratti nel <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with a lasso (freehand) path.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> che hit test di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> con un lazo (a mano libera).

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalLassoHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetIncrementalLassoHitTester restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>che considera un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>sia "riscontri" quando lazo circonda tale</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to select a stroke with a lasso tool.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile per implementare le funzionalità, ad esempio la possibilità di selezionare un tratto con lo strumento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> to implement the lasso selection tool.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>per implementare lo strumento di selezione lazo.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: The minimum percentage of each <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> that must be contained within the lasso for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: La percentuale minima di ogni <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> che deve essere contenuta all'interno di lazo affinché possa essere considerato un riscontro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester"> </xref> che hit test di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> with an erasing path.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> che hit test di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> con un tracciato di cancellazione.

trans-unit.source: The GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> that considers a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> to be "hit" when the eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo GetIncrementalStrokeHitTester restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>che considera un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>sia "riscontri" quando il percorso di gomma interseca tale</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for implementing features, such as the ability to erase part of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile per implementare le funzionalità, ad esempio la possibilità di cancellare una parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>quando la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the tip of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"> </xref> che specifica la punta dello stilo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"></xref> that hit tests the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester"> </xref> che hit test di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore della proprietà personalizzata associata a specificata <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A> and GetPropertyData methods enable you to add custom properties to a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>GetPropertyData metodi e consentono di aggiungere proprietà personalizzate a un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.AddPropertyData%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then include extra information with a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile includere informazioni aggiuntive con un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> associated with the custom property to get.

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUIDs of any custom properties associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il GUID di qualsiasi proprietà personalizzate associate di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref:System.Guid>che rappresentano gli identificatori di proprietà personalizzata.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tratti che intersecano il punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The point to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Il punto da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects that intersect the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> gli oggetti che intersecano il punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that have at least the specified percentage of length within the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tratti che hanno almeno alla percentuale specificata della lunghezza all'interno dell'area specificata.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the bounds of the area to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti dell'area da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The acceptable length of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>, as a percentage, for `lassoPoints` to contain.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza di accettabile di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>, come percentuale, per `lassoPoints` per contenere.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that has strokes with at least the specified percentage within the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> che ha i tratti con almeno alla percentuale specificata all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> matrice.

trans-unit.target: lassoPointsis .

trans-unit.target: -or- percentageWithinLasso is .

trans-unit.target: lassoPointscontiene una matrice vuota.

trans-unit.source: percentageWithinLasso is less than 0 or greater than 100.
trans-unit.target: percentageWithinLassoè minore di 0 o maggiore di 100.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect with the specified path.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tratti che intersecano con il percorso specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array to type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the path to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta il percorso da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape"></xref> that specifies the shape of `eraserPath`.

trans-unit.source: A of strokes that intersect with path.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto di tratti che intersecano con path .

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that intersect the specified area.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tratti che intersecano l'area specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to hit test.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni dell'area intorno il <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> objects that intersect the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> gli oggetti che intersecano il punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of strokes that have at least the specified percentage of length within the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di tratti che hanno almeno alla percentuale specificata della lunghezza all'interno del rettangolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounds to be hit tested.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che specifica i limiti da sottoporre a hit testing.

trans-unit.source: The minimum required length of a Stroke that must exist within bounds for it to be considered hit.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza minima richiesta di un tratto che deve essere presente all'interno dei limiti per poter essere considerato un riscontro.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> that has strokes with at least the specified percentage within the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> che ha i tratti con almeno alla percentuale specificata all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> nel <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns -1 if `stroke` is not a member of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf restituisce -1 se `stroke` non è un membro di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The stroke whose position is required.
trans-unit.target: Il tratto la cui posizione è richiesto.

trans-unit.source: The index of the stroke.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del tratto.

trans-unit.source: Represents the native persistence format for ink data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il formato nativo della persistenza per i dati di input penna.

trans-unit.source: Use the InkSerializedFormat field to specify the format of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> when you transfer data, such as when you copy the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Usare il campo InkSerializedFormat per specificare il formato di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>quando si trasferiscono dati, ad esempio quando si copia il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>negli Appunti.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a stroke into the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un tratto nel <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The specified stroke
trans-unit.target: Il tratto specificato

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando una qualsiasi <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> le modifiche alle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: Dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.PropertyDataChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.PropertyDataChangedEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: The OnStrokesChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnStrokesChanged consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato che è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when custom property is added or removed from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando la proprietà personalizzata viene aggiunto o rimosso dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified strokes from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove i tratti specificati dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged> event for each <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> it removes.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Remove genera il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>evento per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>viene rimosso.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection.StrokesChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes the stroke at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il tratto dell'indice specificato dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Removes the custom property associated with the specified <xref:System.Guid>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Salva il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> al <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> specificato

trans-unit.target: Il metodo Save salva il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>come input penna serializzato formato (ISF).</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Stream>in cui salvare il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Saves the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> and compresses it, when specified.
trans-unit.target: Salva il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> specificata <xref:System.IO.Stream>e, se viene specificato, lo comprime.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to compress the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per comprimere il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the stroke at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce il tratto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The position at which to replace the stroke.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui sostituire il tratto.

trans-unit.source: The stroke to replace the current stroke.
trans-unit.target: Il tratto da sostituire il tratto corrente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref> in the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref> le modifiche di raccolta.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Modifies each of the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke.StylusPoints*> and optionally the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.StylusTipTransform*> for each stroke in the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> according to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Modifica ogni il <> </> *> e facoltativamente la <> </> *> per ogni tratto nel <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> in base alle specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `applyToStylusTip` is `true`, the Transform method affects the shape of the stylus tip, as well as the position of the strokes.
trans-unit.target: Quando `applyToStylusTip` è `true`, il metodo Transform applica la forma della punta dello stilo, nonché la posizione dei tratti.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you rotate a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> 90 degrees, the strokes move around an axis and the height and width of the strokes appear to be inverted.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si ruota un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>90 gradi, spostare i tratti attorno a un asse e l'altezza e larghezza dei tratti sembrano essere invertiti.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> which specifies the transformation to perform on the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref> che specifica la trasformazione per eseguire il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to apply the transformation to the tip of the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per applicare la trasformazione per la punta dello stilo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
